name: cbvditgv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3))

stmt.origin: cbvditg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
stmt.pretty: cbvditg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c3))
-| wnfc(s1, c2)
-| wnfc(s0, c3)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

|- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3))
